Get in touch[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Responsive Design” image=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/responsive-website.png” icon_alignment=”left” admin_label=”Service” module_class=”jucra_blurb_with_button” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font=”Open Sans|800|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.7em” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” body_link_font=”Open Sans|600||on|||||” background_color=”#1fb6ea” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 20%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_start_position=”20%” background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|10px|70px|10px|false|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation=”off” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_radii_image=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” global_colors_info=”{}”]In today’s mobile-centric world, responsive design is crucial for ensuring optimal user experience. As a leading web development agency in India, AA Group prioritizes mobile-friendly and responsive website design. We create websites that seamlessly adapt to different screen sizes and devices, providing a user-friendly experience across smartphones, tablets, and desktops. Our designs prioritize ease of navigation, ensuring that users can access and interact with your website effortlessly, regardless of the device they are using. Trust us to develop responsive websites that cater to the needs of your mobile audience and enhance overall user satisfaction.

Get in touch[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”WordPress CMS” image=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/wordpress-development.png” icon_alignment=”left” admin_label=”Service” module_class=”jucra_blurb_with_button” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ header_font=”Open Sans|800|||||||” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.7em” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#ffffff” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.8em” body_link_font=”Open Sans|600||on|||||” background_color=”#1fb6ea” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#29c4a9 20%|#2b87da 100%” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_start_position=”20%” background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|10px|70px|10px|false|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation=”off” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_radii_image=”on|4px|4px|4px|4px” global_colors_info=”{}”]WordPress CMS is indeed the most widely used Content Management System (CMS) globally, with approximately 60.4% of active websites built on it. As a leading website development platform, WordPress offers a robust and user-friendly framework for creating and managing websites. Its intuitive interface, extensive plugin ecosystem, and flexibility make it an ideal choice for businesses of all sizes. Whether you need a simple blog or a complex e-commerce website, WordPress provides a reliable and scalable solution that empowers you to build and maintain a successful online presence.

WordPress Development Services

Best WordPress development company

Let’s start with some facts about WordPress & CMS

  • WordPress powers more than 30.4% of websites today
  • WordPress website is SEO friendly.
  • WordPress website can save you a lot of money and time.

But why?
Well, because WordPress CMS has more than 60.4% share of the web industry. It’s indeed Everywhere!
